title: Linguae Graecae Per Se Illustrata
author: Seumas Macdonald (with much help)
description: LGPSI is an open-ended collaborative project to develop sets of graded reading that guide learners from the beginning to a reading proficiency in ancient Greek (initially Koine, eventually expanding into Attic, Homer, and Byzantine).

words.gloss: A letter in the Ancient Greek alphabet
suffix indicating a state or condition
pronunciation of the letter 'C' in the Ancient Greek alphabet
the (feminine form of the definite article)
on one hand/one the one hand
he, she, it, himself, herself, itself, the same
to smell, to perceive by smell
to snarl or growl like a dog
related to Homer or Homer's works

title.display: τὸ κεφάλαιον τὸ τέταρτον καὶ δέκατον

words.gloss: of or related to the people

title.display: τὸ κεφάλαιον τὸ πέμπτον καὶ δέκατον

words.gloss: to be educated or to be raised
to rejoice / to be glad / to greet
to study or to be diligent
Name of a male Ancient Greek poet
things that have happened or come to pass
